mapper.select:
SELECT A.BZCD AS BZCD , A.BZNM AS BZNM , A.SQN_CD AS SQN_CD , A.SQN_NM AS SQN_NM , CASE WHEN B.EMPNM IS NULL THEN '미배정' ELSE B.EMPNM END AS EMP_NM , A.PRJT_ID AS PRJT_ID , A.BKUP_ID AS BKUP_ID , A.TOT_CNT AS TOT_CNT , A.CMPL_CNT AS CMPL_CNT , A.NCMPL_CNT AS NCMPL_CNT , A.PRNR_RT AS PRNR_RT , A.TOT_CNT1 AS TOT_CNT1 , A.CMPL_CNT1 AS CMPL_CNT1 , A.NCMPL_CNT1 AS NCMPL_CNT1 , A.PRNR_RT1 AS PRNR_RT1 , A.TOT_CNT2 AS TOT_CNT2 , A.CMPL_CNT2 AS CMPL_CNT2 FROM ( SELECT A.BZCD AS BZCD , A.BZNM AS BZNM , A.SQN_CD AS SQN_CD , A.SQN_NM AS SQN_NM , A.DVLPE_NO AS DVLPE_NO , A.PRJT_ID AS PRJT_ID , A.BKUP_ID AS BKUP_ID , B.TOT_CNT AS TOT_CNT , B.CMPL_CNT AS CMPL_CNT , B.NCMPL_CNT AS NCMPL_CNT , B.PRNR_RT AS PRNR_RT , C.TOT_CNT AS TOT_CNT1 , C.CMPL_CNT AS CMPL_CNT1 , C.NCMPL_CNT AS NCMPL_CNT1 , C.PRNR_RT AS PRNR_RT1 , D.TOT_CNT AS TOT_CNT2 , D.CMPL_CNT AS CMPL_CNT2 FROM (SELECT A.DTLS_TYCD AS BZCD , A.DTLS_TYNM AS BZNM , A.PRJT_ID AS PRJT_ID , A.BKUP_ID AS BKUP_ID , B.DVLPE_NO AS DVLPE_NO , NVL(B.SQN_CD,'100') AS SQN_CD , NVL(C.SQN_NM,'1차수') AS SQN_NM FROM pms_cd_del_mng A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BZCD ,DVLPE_NO ,SQN_CD FROM pms_pgm_mng WHERE SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} GROUP BY BZCD, DVLPE_NO, SQN_CD) B ON B.BZCD = A.DTLS_TYCD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD AS SQN_CD ,DTLS_TYNM AS SQN_NM FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND GRP_TYCD = '1000000006' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id}) C ON B.SQN_CD = C.SQN_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.ETC_TXT1 = 'Y' AND A.GRP_TYCD = '1000000001' AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} ORDER BY A.DTLS_TYCD , A.DTLS_TYNM , B.SQN_CD, B.DVLPE_NO) A INNER JOIN (SELECT AA.BZCD , AA.DVLPE_NO , AA.SQN_CD , AA.TOT_CNT , AA.CMPL_CNT , AA.NCMPL_CNT , NVL2(AA.TOT_CNT,ROUND(((AA.CMPL_CNT/AA.TOT_CNT) * 100), 2),0) AS PRNR_RT FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.DVLPE_NO , A.SQN_CD , COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRC_STEP_CD IN ('200','300', '400','500','600') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CMPL_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.FRCS_END_DT < DATE_FORMAT(#{inp_date},'%Y%m%d') AND A.PRC_STEP_CD IN ('000', '100','110') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS NCMPL_CNT FROM pms_pgm_mng A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DVLP_DIS_CD IN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND GRP_TYCD = '1000000031' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AND A.SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} GROUP BY A.BZCD, A.DVLPE_NO, A.SQN_CD ) AA ) B ON B.BZCD = A.BZCD AND B.DVLPE_NO = A.DVLPE_NO AND B.SQN_CD = A.SQN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BB.BZCD , BB.DVLPE_NO , BB.SQN_CD , BB.TOT_CNT , BB.CMPL_CNT , BB.NCMPL_CNT , NVL2(BB.TOT_CNT,ROUND(((BB.CMPL_CNT/BB.TOT_CNT) * 100), 2),0) AS PRNR_RT FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.DVLPE_NO , A.SQN_CD , COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRC_STEP_CD IN ('200','300', '400','500','600') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CMPL_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRC_STEP_CD IN ('000', '100','110') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS NCMPL_CNT FROM pms_pgm_mng A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DVLP_DIS_CD IN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND GRP_TYCD = '1000000031' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AND A.SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.FRCS_END_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL -6 DAY),'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{inp_date},'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY A.BZCD, A.DVLPE_NO, A.SQN_CD ) BB ) C ON C.BZCD = A.BZCD AND C.DVLPE_NO = A.DVLPE_NO AND C.SQN_CD = A.SQN_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CC.BZCD , CC.DVLPE_NO , CC.SQN_CD , CC.TOT_CNT , CC.CMPL_CNT FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.DVLPE_NO , A.SQN_CD , COUNT(*) AS TOT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN A.PRC_STEP_CD IN ('200','300', '400','500','600') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS CMPL_CNT FROM pms_pgm_mng A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DVLP_DIS_CD IN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND GRP_TYCD = '1000000031' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AND A.SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.FRCS_END_DT BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y%m%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL 7 DAY),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY A.BZCD, A.DVLPE_NO, A.SQN_CD ) CC ) D ON D.BZCD = A.BZCD AND D.DVLPE_NO = A.DVLPE_NO AND D.SQN_CD = A.SQN_CD WHERE 1=1
AND A.BZCD = #{bzcd} ) A
) A
LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info B ON B.EMPNO = A.DVLPE_NO AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID ORDER BY A.SQN_CD DESC, A.BZCD, B.EMPNM

SELECT A.BZNM , A.BZCD , D.SQN_CD , E.SQN_NM , D.NPRRN_KBN , D.PGM_ID , D.PGM_NM , CASE WHEN D.FRCS_END_DT IS NOT NULL AND D.FRCS_END_DT != '' THEN STR_TO_DATE(D.FRCS_END_DT , '%Y%m%d') ELSE '' END AS FRCS_END_DT , CASE WHEN D.DVLPE_CNF_DT IS NOT NULL AND D.DVLPE_CNF_DT != '' THEN STR_TO_DATE(D.DVLPE_CNF_DT , '%Y%m%d') ELSE '' END AS DVLPE_CNF_DT , B.EMPNM AS DVLPE_NM , C.EMPNM AS PL_NM , D.CRPE_YN AS CRPE_YN , D.PL_ENO AS PL_ENO , D.NPRRN FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.SQN_CD , '개발' AS NPRRN_KBN , A.PGM_ID AS PGM_ID , A.PGM_NM AS PGM_NM , A.FRCS_END_DT AS FRCS_END_DT , A.DVLPE_CNF_DT AS DVLPE_CNF_DT , A.DVLPE_NO AS DVLPE_NO , A.PL_NO AS PL_ENO , A.PRJT_ID AS PRJT_ID , A.BKUP_ID AS BKUP_ID , CASE WHEN A.PRC_STEP_CD IN ('000', '100','110') THEN '부' ELSE '여' END AS CRPE_YN , CASE WHEN A.DVLPE_CNF_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL -6 DAY),'%Y%m%d') AND A.PRC_STEP_CD = '200' THEN '부' ELSE '' END AS PL_YN , CONCAT('처리단계 : ', B.DTLS_TYNM , CHAR(10) , A.PRG_TXT) AS NPRRN FROM pms_pgm_mng A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_cd_del_mng B ON B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.GRP_TYCD = '1000000002' AND B.DTLS_TYCD = A.PRC_STEP_CD WHERE 1=1 AND A.DVLP_DIS_CD IN ( SELECT DTLS_TYCD FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND GRP_TYCD = '1000000031' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) AND A.SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND A.PRC_STEP_CD IN ('000', '100', '110', '200') AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND (A.FRCS_END_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(#{inp_date},'%Y%m%d') OR A.DVLPE_CNF_DT != '') ) A WHERE 1=1 AND (A.CRPE_YN = '부' OR A.PL_YN = '부')
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.BZCD , A.CCTN_SQN_CD AS SQN_CD , CASE WHEN A.ERR_TYCD = '100' THEN '결함' WHEN A.ERR_TYCD = '200' THEN '개선' ELSE '기타결함' END AS NPRRN_KBN , A.CCTN_ID AS CCTN_ID , B.PGM_NM AS PGM_NM , A.TTMN_SCD_DT AS FRCS_END_DT , A.TTMN_DT AS DVLPE_CNF_DT , A.DVLPE_NO AS DVLPE_NO , A.PL_NO AS PL_ENO , A.PRJT_ID AS PRJT_ID , A.BKUP_ID AS BKUP_ID , CASE WHEN A.ERR_PRC_STEP_CD IN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID AND PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND GRP_TYCD = '1000000034' AND USE_YN = 'Y') THEN '여' ELSE '부' END AS CRPE_YN , CASE WHEN A.TTMN_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{inp_date},INTERVAL -1 DAY),'%Y%m%d') AND A.ERR_PRC_STEP_CD = '600' THEN '부' ELSE '' END AS PL_YN , A.TTMN_TXT AS NPRRN FROM pms_err_mng A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BKUP_ID , PRJT_ID , PGM_ID , PGM_NM FROM pms_pgm_mng WHERE 1=1 AND DVLP_DIS_CD IN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND GRP_TYCD = '1000000031' AND USE_YN = 'Y') AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} ) B ON B.PGM_ID = A.CCTN_ID AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.ERR_TYCD IN ('100', '200', '900') AND A.ERR_PRC_STEP_CD IN ('100', '200', '300', '400', '600') AND A.CCTN_SQN_CD = CASE WHEN #{sqn_cd} = 'TTT' THEN A.CCTN_SQN_CD ELSE #{sqn_cd} END AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND A.RGS_DSCD = '1100' ) A WHERE 1=1 AND (A.CRPE_YN = '부' OR A.PL_YN = '부') ) D LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD AS BZCD ,DTLS_TYNM AS BZNM FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE GRP_TYCD = '1000000001' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} ) A ON A.BZCD = D.BZCD LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info B ON B.EMPNO = D.DVLPE_NO AND B.PRJT_ID = D.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = D.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info C ON C.EMPNO = D.PL_ENO AND C.PRJT_ID = D.PRJT_ID AND C.BKUP_ID = D.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DTLS_TYCD AS SQN_CD ,DTLS_TYNM AS SQN_NM FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE GRP_TYCD = '1000000006' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} ) E ON E.SQN_CD = D.SQN_CD
WHERE 1=1
AND A.BZCD = #{bzcd}
ORDER BY D.SQN_CD DESC , A.BZCD , D.NPRRN_KBN , B.EMPNM , D.DVLPE_CNF_DT , D.PGM_ID
